channel.title: [Authentic OSRS #83] Lost Isle PvP Beta | Resizable Support | Amazing Combat |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YlHBDUi.png[/img] [SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://lost-isle.org/LostIsleOSRS.jar"]Play[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://lost-isle.org/forum/"]Forums[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Lost-Isle is a OSRS private server, determined to bring content that looks and feels realistic. Lost Isle has primarily been a 317 server, but we are now hoping to step away from the modified client that comes with 317 to offer a more authentic game-play experience.[/SIZE]
[/CENTER] [SIZE=4][B]Features:[/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Realistic combat formulas [*]Complete bank tabs [*]100% Working clan chat [*]Real OSRS #83 Client [*]Custom Item System that allows you to gain new gear as you PK. [*]Starter of 15M that you can use at the shops to get basic gear to start PKing[/ul]
[SIZE=4][B]Media[/B][/SIZE] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lwcpA3F5ISs https://youtu.be/SxjswdU1k4s https://youtu.be/VTIf46mXNzA [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tFKGItx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oKppyxm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A6RSnrt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YlvAoQe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a4J65En.png[/img]

item.title: [Authentic OSRS #83] Lost Isle PvP Beta | Resizable Support | Amazing Combat |
item.dc:creator: @ownertim ownertim
item.description:
@ownertim wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:2, topic:552802”]Compared to the other OSRS remakes, this isn’t one of them that makes me jump out of my seat. Why should people play your server over the other remakes? And what unique features does this have that the others don’t?

Also, in your last picture, what is up with your runes?[/quote]

Those are runepacks and what sets us apart? We use the actual OSRS Game Client from Revision #83, The only other hosted server I know of that uses an actual OSRS Game Client is OS-RSPS, That makes 2 servers that use the actual OSRS Client Vs’s all the 317 modified clients.

Edit:
Got a new video of Pking
[VIDEO]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lwcpA3F5ISs[/VIDEO]

Read full topic
item.source: [Authentic OSRS #83] Lost Isle PvP Beta | Resizable Support | Amazing Combat |
